text:
Anyone here know if there's a way to check the status of a juliabloggers RSS request? I don't see any kind of confirmation
<https://www.juliabloggers.com/julia-bloggers-submit-feed/>

attachments.title: Submit Your RSS/Atom Feed | juliabloggers.com
attachments.text: If you are interested in contributing your content to Julia Bloggers, fill out the form below. Please only submit an RSS/Atom feed for the specific tag on your blog related to Julia of which you are the original author. For example, on WordPress, the RSS feed link for a ‘Julia’ tag would look like: <http://randyzwitch.com/tag/julia/feed/> […]
attachments.fallback: juliabloggers.com: Submit Your RSS/Atom Feed | juliabloggers.com

elements.text: Anyone here know if there's a way to check the status of a juliabloggers RSS request? I don't see any kind of confirmation

text: I don't think there is. You'll just see it next time you post I think.

elements.text: I don't think there is. You'll just see it next time you post I think.

text: No worries. Looking forward to see more blogs about Julia :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: No worries. Looking forward to see more blogs about Julia
